author: gargiulo.gianni
title: Stakeboard: Social Staking Platform
description: 为了支持越来越多的繁荣的SPO，授权需要更容易、更有信息量、更有信任感和更有利可图。

f6_assessments.q0:
本提案中描述的问题与挑战密切相关。去中心化是任何公共区块链的核心和非常重要的支柱。即使与其他PoS区块链相比，Cardano有很好的区块生产者分布，但需要注意的是，在加密货币领域，有很多竞争被拉平的情况，具体到本案例中，就是PoS区块链的问题，这些区块链的验证者很少（少于30个），在很多情况下，不同的验证者由同一个实体控制。去中心化是确保公共区块链的安全性和抗审查性，因为它使攻击的成本（如51%攻击）更高，阻止区块创建者串通起来攻击区块链。该提案清楚而客观地描述了Cardano中集中生产区块的痛点，这些痛点是大型交易所和多池的所有者。

建议的解决方案打算通过一个市场，促进委托者的UI/UX。作为Cardano社区的版主，我几乎每天都会收到用户的投诉，他们在寻求关于如何和在哪里选择一个池子的信息时遇到困难。今天，这种类型的信息在绝大多数情况下都是人工策划的，有一个可以提供策划的平台有很好的机会在SPO之间实现公平竞争。

这些指标/指数/KPIs表明对SPO生态系统有很大的潜在影响。
f6_assessments.q1:
首先，Stakeboard已经是一个全面发展的项目，并且在获得催化剂公司的资助之前已经完成了几个可交付的项目，这表明有一个可靠和富有成效的团队。

提案中描述的团队信息很详细，所描述的经验和已经完成的工作表明，该团队完全有能力发展这项工作。

预算分解描述了3个项目，然而，关于如何使用这些钱的细节却很少。在我看来，5000美元的 "用户体验 "的定义似乎很模糊，这影响了对所要求的预算的可行性评估。我希望看到更多的细节，表明每个步骤的工作量/所需时间x相应的报酬。

尽管要求的预算很模糊，但考虑到2名工程师的报酬和拟议的交付成果，我相信要求的金额是合理的。

路线图准备得很好，时间表、可交付成果/里程碑在时间上都很清晰。

该计划本身并不存在很大的技术复杂性或障碍，因为其概念更侧重于在网站上策划信息/数据。我认为唯一的风险点是Stakeboard将如何处理语言障碍，考虑到目标是一个更简单的用户界面/用户界面，非英语用户将如何得到服务？
f6_assessments.q2:
对问题和解决方案的描述很清晰，提案是如何与它们保持一致的。路线图设计得非常好，有可交付的成果/里程碑，使审计提案更容易。

衡量标准和关键绩效指标选择得很好，我相信它们是评估成功的好指标，因为所选择的产出将清楚地表明用户和参与的SPO的数量以及随着时间推移的进展情况。
f6_assessments.reply: The CA's thoughtful assessment is commendable, and greatly appreciated. Their recommendations are insightful and entirely valid, and we'll take them into account in our development efforts, as well as in any future proposal - especially how to make the platform conducive to non-English speakers. One of our plans is to be able to search for SPOs based on language preference, but we'll give this issue more consideration.

f6_assessments.q0:
The problem needing to be solved has been identified and articulated namely To support a growing number of prosperous SPOs, delegating needs to be easier, more informative, more trust-inspiring, and more lucrative.




It is clear that this proposal falls within the scope of the challenge brief whereby Stakeboard is a social staking marketplace designed to promote decentralization by improving key aspects of Cardano's staking landscape.
 
This proposal shows how it adds value to the Cardano system by creating such a solution
 
  Key metrics  would be  number of users, no of wallets, no of fiat transactions, no of ADA transactions.
 

The key metrics and goals of the proposal fall within the scope of the challenge
   
Proposal can be scaled up to address future challenges by adding more businesses who use the same solution

This project will have a positive impact on Cardano system by enabling small businesses to get on board.

I can say that this proposal adequately addresses the challenge  hence i have given it a 5 star rating.


I am qualified to write this assessment based on being a translator since 1992 at the State Broadcasting Corporation as well as since that time,running my own translation agency, working with the two native languages of my country as well as working on various translation projects into other languages, including translation, transcription and proofreading. I have also been an event organizer in various capacities, both through my company and on a voluntary basis for youth groups and churches.  I also have run a web development company from 1997 and have been the author of many ground breaking projects in web and Flash related projects in my country including payment gateway containing sites.

f6_assessments.reply: The CA's thoughtful assessment is commendable, and greatly appreciated. Their recommendations are insightful and entirely valid, and we'll take them into account in our development efforts, as well as in any future proposal.

f6_assessments.q0: This proposal was prepared by a professional team that clearly points out current problems and offers excellent solutions. This kind of project definitely has a positive impact on the Cardano and Catalyst ecosystem. It is clearly presented in detail how it will add value to the Cardano ecosystem. The KPIs in this proposal are phenomenally elaborated and presented and fully meet the ones indicated in the challenge. Without any problems the proposal is able to scale and address future challenges. Excellent preparation of the proposal!
f6_assessments.q1: The team is transparent, professional and through the links provided in the proposal we can clearly see who will work on the project. The work done so far and all the necessary skills, knowledge and experience needed to implement this project are listed. The budget is clearly presented and broken down into identifiable items but it would be good to present the work schedule required and job fees. In Global Sustainable Indep. SPO's challenge we have 28 ideas looking for money. It might be a good idea to ask for a little less than this amount for this proposal. Because if we ask for almost half the amount of the whole challenge, we either don't care about others or we need to increase the budget of the challenge. The team does not state the need for additional funds. The team clearly presents a detailed implementable plan and details of actionable tasks and order of execution. The time frame within which the work will be done was presented and elaborated, and the resources needed were explained, but it would be good if the technical aspects were presented in more detail. Such a project certainly has possible risks, which unfortunately have not been mentioned.
f6_assessments.q2: The team perfectly developed and presented a roadmap with milestones and a time horizon for achievement. The KPIs that define the success of the proposal are also perfectly developed and presented and they can be used to quantify the success of the project and they fully make sense. The community can be satisfied because it can track the progress of the project without any problems.
f6_assessments.reply: The CA's thoughtful assessment is greatly appreciated. While I think we've put together an excellent proposal overall, most of the constructive criticism here is entirely valid. While we believe we deserve a bit higher score in the feasibility of the project, we do respect the time and attention the CA gave in assessing it, and on that account are not challenging this specific aspect of their assessment.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal is a great idea for the ecosystem and definitely aligns with the challenge. Such solid platform that enable "all in one" place for delegators and SPO(s) are very important and innovates the current ways of how ADA holders delegate and operate staking pools. Moreover, this proposal help ADA holders to make the right decisions when choosing a stakepool, with its solutions and Alice (bot) that alerts of malicious and bad actors in the ecosystem. I'm giving this a 5, as the proposer have already made initiatives on what they are aiming to do and have much confidence that this proposal will be a game-changer in the Cardano ecosystem.
f6_assessments.q1: The proposer claims to be a team of various field that would make the project successful, with addition of a solid and detailed roadmap, KPI(s) and key metrics that align with the challenge. They have already completed many objectives and have a very wide vision for the ecosystem to reach healthier and much secured platform for users both delegators and SPO(s). Though I would love to add a feature whereby, the platform has a "favourite" feature that allows users to have a list of liked staking pools. Besides that, the approach on the UI/UX of the dashboard presented on their website is really on-point of how the proposers use user-centric approach. This proposal gives great example of how voters can have confidence during the voting phase. I would also like to add that this proposal adds so much value of convenience to existing holders with a simplified, all-in-one, well informed platform.
f6_assessments.q2: The budget is outlined clearly and broken down into identifiable items and are reasonable to achieve the goals. Offering such realistic timetable to complete the work and clearly explains technical aspects of the project are sufficient to have great auditability of their progress. Potentially an intriguing concept but the proposer can further list out the risks that the will be addressing along with how they will be managing those risks.
f6_assessments.reply: The CA's thoughtful assessment is greatly appreciated. While I think we've put together an excellent proposal overall, the constructive criticism presented here is entirely valid.

f6_assessments.q0: This is a bridge between the SPO and Delegator worlds. Some pieces are already under development. The Alice detective from stale-board is nicely finding changes in pool's parameters and if a delegator was subscribed to this then they would easily make decisions on changing stake pool or staying with same pool. This has great utility for delegators and SPO
f6_assessments.q1: Some pieces are already working. So I have no doubt that this will be implemented successfully by the team
f6_assessments.q2: the proposal has details that can be easily audited like how many pool operators joined program, how is their pool getting benefit from this etc.
f6_assessments.reply: Succinct but helpful and (I believe) accurate assessment of our proposal. The CA's appreciation for our thoroughness and confidence in our team is greatly appreciated.
